H0.text: What is the oldest medical journal in the United States. Journal of the American Medical Association (JAMA)

H1.text: What is the oldest medical journal in the United States. American Journal of Medicine

H2.text: What is the oldest medical journal in the United States. Archives of Internal Medicine

H3.text: What is the oldest medical journal in the United States. NEJM

A4.text: The American Journal of the Medical Sciences was established in 1820.

A5.text: JAMA was established in 1883 by the American Medical Association.

A6.text: Free copies of volumes 1–80 (1883–1923), from the Internet Archive and HathiTrust

A7.text: Founded in 1812, the journal is among the most prestigious peer-reviewed medical journals.

A8.text: In September 1811, Boston physician John Collins Warren, along with James Jackson, submitted a formal prospectus to establish the New England Journal of Medicine and Surgery and Collateral Branches of Science as a medical and philosophical journal.
